attributes.action: Nationality Act. Nationality is inherited from parents Not country of birth.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a clear need to clarify Nationality status of the indigenous people of the United Kingdom.Those born here of foreign parents should be allowed to keep their Parents Nationality and not labeled as British.
There is a desperate need for the indigenous peoples of these islands to have their rights and heritage protected.The current rules that allow any one who is born here automatic United Kingdom citizenship this is wrong.The abuse of  citizenship must be stopped.
